meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of an epiphany.
meanings.sent1: The epiphanic moment filled her with joy and understanding.
meanings.sent2: It was an epiphanic experience that changed his perspective forever.
meanings.sent3: The epiphanic realization that he had forgotten his keys made him laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her epiphanic discovery unlocked a new world of possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The epiphanic sunset painted the sky in brilliant colors.

meanings.definition: Involving a sudden realization or insight.
meanings.sent1: The epiphanic truth dawned on him in an instant.
meanings.sent2: She had an epiphanic moment while staring at the stars.
meanings.sent3: His epiphanic idea to solve the problem surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The epiphanic clarity washed over her like a wave.
meanings.sent5: The epiphanic dream revealed the answer he had been seeking.
